metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1940

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IBM POWER
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IPF
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for x86
SUSE Linux Enterprise Teradata 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T

metadata.Description: X.Org X server before 1.13.4 and 1.4.x before 1.14.1 does not properly restrict access to input events when adding a new hot-plug device, which might allow physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitive information, as demonstrated by reading passwords from a tty.
